question: Bring out the only incorrectÂ statement:
option1: The number of members of the constituent assembly was increased after the Mountbatten Plan of 3 June, 1947
option2: On 13 December, 1946, Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru moved the Objectives Resolution that outlined the basics of the constitution
option3: B N Rao was appointed the Constitutional Advisor of the Assembly
option4: First meeting of the Constituent Assembly took place of Dec 9, 1946 with Dr. Sachidanand Sinha as its interim President
answer: The number of members of the constituent assembly was increased after the Mountbatten Plan of 3 June, 1947
explanation: The total membership Constituent Assembly was to be 389. However, as a result of the partition under the Mountbatten Plan of 3 June, 1947, a separate Constituent Assembly was set up for Pakistan.
